title: Spencer Hall talks Lincoln Riley to USC, Brian Kelly to LSU
description:
Bomani Jones and Spencer Hall chat about the rapidly spinning college football coaching carousel, including what attracted Lincoln Riley from Oklahoma to USC (5:03) and how Brian Kelly will fair at “the most interesting program in the country” in LSU after leaving Notre Dame (26:09).
